definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: It is ordinary arithmetic that the stronger will win, so why fight?
sentences.chinese: 強者會勝是一種很普通的算術，那爲什麼爭鬥？

sentences.english: Battles between these mega carnivores must have been quite a spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 這些大傢伙之間的爭鬥場面肯定相當壯觀。

sentences.english: Alucard: Mankind continues to fight, but it is a desperate fight to stay alive.
sentences.chinese: 人類依舊爭鬥不止，其生命本身便是一場絕望的戰鬥。

sentences.english: In his anger he hit the man, and a fight ensued.
sentences.chinese: 他在憤怒之下打了那人，一場爭鬥將隨之而起。

sentences.english: These dukedoms often fought one another to expand their territories .
sentences.chinese: 這些國家常常爲了擴大自己的領土而互相爭鬥。

sentences.english: Liberty is in every blow! Let us do or die. ----- Robbert Burns, British poet.
sentences.chinese: 自由存在於每一次爭鬥中，讓我們決一死戰。

sentences.english: Rival supporters fought running battles on the streets of the capital Conakry.
sentences.chinese: 不同黨派的支持者在首都科納克里街頭展開了爭鬥。

sentences.english: The letter continues a legal battle between Mr. Harder and Gawker.
sentences.chinese: 這封信延續了哈德與高客之間的法律爭鬥。

sentences.english: A father had a family of sons who were perpetually quarreling among themselves.
sentences.chinese: 有個父親的兒子們常常互相爭鬥不休。

sentences.english: The problem with Establishment Republicans is they abhor the unseemliness of a political brawl.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨的人問題是他們厭惡不成體統的政治上的爭鬥。

sentences.english: Ensure family in Jin Guoqing previous fight against each other edge is always maintained.
sentences.chinese: 保證了其在晉國卿族的歷次互相爭鬥中始終保有優勢。

sentences.english: Q. Did you expect it to be as decisive as this with the Red Bulls picking up just one point?
sentences.chinese: 你是否認爲這是與紅牛爭鬥中的一場決定性的勝利？

sentences.english: Others may have evolved them as a form of intrasexual conflict.
sentences.chinese: 也有些物種將此行爲演變成同種性別內的爭鬥。

sentences.english: The Weasels and the Mice were always up in arms against each other.
sentences.chinese: 黃鼠狼與老鼠一族一直以來都爭鬥不休。

sentences.english: Eagle from time to understand the fate of the difficult and deadly battle cruelty.
sentences.chinese: 鷹從這時就明白了命運的艱難和爭鬥的殊死殘酷性。

sentences.english: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig.
sentences.chinese: 很早以前我就懂得，永遠不要與豬爭鬥。

definition: to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to rupture/to burst open/to break/to break off relations with/a rupture
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
